name: Stuffed N' Mashed Potatoes
desc: An exquisitely colorful dish. Mash the potatoes into a fine creamy state, add various fillings in the middle, then finally, drizzle with sauce for a touch of brightness. The end result is not dissimilar from a finely-made cake, and is the favorite dish of many in Natlan.

customize.name: Recipe: Stuffed N' Mashed Potatoes
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Stuffed N' Mashed Potatoes.

customize.name: Delicious Stuffed N' Mashed Potatoes
customize.desc: An exquisitely colorful dish. The eye-catching colors and soft, delicate texture contain overlapping tastes that bump against your tastebuds in a flavor firework show. Such a perfect appetizer leaves you in unsurpassed anticipation for the main dish.

customize.name: Suspicious Stuffed N' Mashed Potatoes
customize.desc: An exquisitely colorful dish. The colors are distinct, and the shape regular, promoting an anticipation that is choked in the crib by the bone-dry potato. Are you sure this is potato mash and not steamed egg yolks?

customize.name: Stuffed N' Mashed Potatoes
customize.desc: An exquisitely colorful dish. Mash the potatoes into a fine creamy state, add various fillings in the middle, then finally, drizzle with sauce for a touch of brightness. The end result is not dissimilar from a finely-made cake, and is the favorite dish of many in Natlan.

customize.name: Potato
customize.desc: A chunky vegetable. A gift from the earth that you never tire of with its multitude of cooking methods.

customize.name: Fish
customize.desc: A fresh fillet of fish. Handled properly, it can make a rich dish.

customize.name: Fowl
customize.desc: A fresh chunk of fowl. Handled properly, it can make a hearty meal.

customize.name: Onion
customize.desc: A spherical vegetable. As vengeance for cutting it, it will make you cry, no matter how brave you are.

value.text: Restores 28% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 620 HP every 5s for 30s.
